node.title: Doubt cast on email from Chinese tennis star Peng Shuai
node.alt: Peng Shuai hits a backhand shot
node.description: There are growing calls from the international tennis community for independent and verifiable proof that the Chinese tennis star is safe and well.
node.content:
["The head of the Women's Tennis Association (WTA) has cast doubt on an email purportedly written by tennis player Peng Shuai and\u00a0released by Chinese state media.", "Chairman of the WTA Steve Simon said in a statement that he had a \"hard time believing\" the email was written by Ms Peng or believing \"what is being attributed to her\".", "Ms Peng, one of China's biggest sport stars, claimed\u00a0on social media earlier this month that a former member of China's Politburo Standing Committee, Zhang Gaoli, allegedly coerced her into sex and that they later had an on-off consensual relationship.", "However, she said in her post, she had no evidence of this and could not prove the allegation.", "The global tennis community has grown alarmed as Ms Peng has not been seen since the post.", "Earlier this week, the governing body of men's tennis (ATP) backed the WTA's\u00a0call for China to investigate the allegations.", "China's global TV network, CGTN, earlier published online the alleged email from Ms Peng\u00a0in which it was stated\u00a0she was \"not missing, nor am I unsafe\".", "\"I've just been resting at home and everything is fine.\"", "The purported email from Ms Peng also states the sexual assault allegations attributed to her\u00a0were \"not true\".", "Doubts have been raised on social media over the authenticity of the email, with the WTA chairman stating he had been unable to reach Ms Peng to confirm after repeated attempts.", "\"The WTA and the rest of the world need independent and verifiable proof that she is safe,\" Mr Simon\u00a0said.", "\"Peng Shuai must be allowed to speak freely, without coercion or intimidation from any source.", "\"Her allegation of sexual assault must be respected, investigated with full transparency and without censorship.\"", "The 35-year-old Ms Peng was the first Chinese player to top the world rankings when she was doubles number one in 2014.", "She won doubles titles at Wimbledon in 2013 and the French Open in 2014.", "Mr Zhang, now 75, was a vice premier between 2013 and 2018 and served on the Politburo Standing Committee between 2012 and 2017.", "Four-time Grand Slam winner Naomi Osaka went on\u00a0social media to\u00a0express her concerns\u00a0over the whereabouts of Ms\u00a0Peng.", "", "
Novak Djokovic has described the disappearance of tennis player Peng Shuai as \"shocking\".
", "\"I was recently informed of a fellow tennis player [who]\u00a0has gone missing shortly after revealing that she has been sexually abused,\" Osaka posted.", "\"Censorship is never OK\u00a0at any cost, I hope Peng Shuai and her family are safe and OK.", "\"I'm in shock of the current situation and I'm sending love and light her way. #whereispengshuai.\"", "ABC/Reuters"]
